channel.title: Reporting posts
channel.description:
When you report a post or a thread, please make sure that the thread hasn't been locked yet or is a really old post. It annoys the hell out of mods like me when sifting through post reports.
THAT MEANS YOU, FRELL!
Thanks, Your fat, friendly moderator, io9`
P.S. Breakage of this rule may result in mute, etc.
